it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.udp

Class UdpPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.DataPacket
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.udp.UdpPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class UdpPacket
extends DataPacket
    User Datagram Protocol (RFC 768) packet unit.

        Creates a new UDP datagram.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - source address
        src_port - source port number
        dst_addr - destination address
        dst_port - destination port number
        data - the packet payload

      • UdpPacket

        public UdpPacket(IpAddress src_addr,
                 int src_port,
                 IpAddress dst_addr,
                 int dst_port,
                 byte[] data_buf,
                 int data_off,
                 int data_len)
        Creates a new UDP datagram.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - source address
        src_port - source port number
        dst_addr - destination address
        dst_port - destination port number
        data_buf - the buffer containing the packet payload
        data_off - the offset within the buffer
        data_len - the payload length
